content.question: Which of the following best describes the rhetorical function of the third paragraph (lines 22-25)?

choices.label: It makes an urgent appeal to the authority of experts.
It makes a concession to an opposing point of view.
It restates the author’s argument at a transitional place in the passage.
It introduces a claim that is undermined in the following paragraph.

content.answer: It restates the author’s argument at a transitional place in the passage.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
